scripts.test: echo "You really think I would write tests for this??" && exit 1
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start1" "npm run start2" "npm run start"
scripts.pm2: pm2 -f --restart-delay=10 start index.js -- 0 && pm2 -f --restart-delay=10 start index.js -- 1 && pm2 -f --restart-delay=10 start index.js -- 2 && pm2 flush && pm2 logs
